data.message: dear costumer of facebook, can you please to check  your inbox of the page to answer me about from my question? thanks a lot!

replies.message: Hi Dimitris. Please check your Inbox for our reply. -Tenaya
Facebook Tenaya - can you please check your inbox for my messages?

Facebook  please reply to my messages & posts!!!!  I WANT MY TICKER BACK.........and please do not insult me by saying use the icon at top of home page....there is no icon........many others are having this problem too.....can some one please sort this

Facebook how many times do I post here for you to solve my problem. My personal account was literally disabled. I appealed to you many times like 30 times but you are replying me the same way. "Thanks for your email. Unfortunately we do not offer support for blocked or disabled accounts from this email alias" Its been 4 weeks now. I gave you already 3 IDs. Please unlock my account Im begging you. My email on that account is kingrj_jose@yahoo.com. Please reply to me
RJ Jose II just make a new one
Ive got important details on that account

Facebook sorry again. i can't i do with this solution because i have problem with email when declared.
is there a possibility of declaring another mail so that it can solve the problem?
I have been messaging you and commenting and emailing for almost 2 weeks, please respond already
